summary:
add a perked dual wield warrior follower and marriageable
he also buys your firewood
No script Vanilla Assets only.
descriptionHtml:
add a perked dual wield warrior follower and marriageable
he also buys your firewood
No script Vanilla Assets only.

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Thank you for the support and donation:
[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]I never thought the community here on nexus are very kind people, I cant thank enough these individuals
who supported me financially so I'll just post their name in my mod pages.
[color=#ffff00][size=3][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7889849/?]mayd4me[/url][/size][/size][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][size=5][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/3089165/?]Huniken[/url][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=5][color=#00ffff][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4053262/?][b]C.P.[/b][/url][/size][/color]
[b]Thierry[/b][/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5](mysterious donator)[/size][/color]

[size=5]You need to sell firewood first to make him follow you.[/size]

This is my tribute to the upcoming film of next wolverine film [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3315342/]Logan[/url]

I recommend these mods [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16511/?]Space Wiking X-Men - Wolverine by [b]SpaceWiking[/b][/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46958/?]Wolverine Claws _animated_ by [b]Anton[/b][/url]
for superb wolverine experience.

I create this mod because I need a business partner that will buy my firewood and also I can bring along to my adventure.
My plan is I would only use this for my personal use but maybe other's would like it so I upload it.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Location: Riverwood Lumber Mill
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements: Skyrim Latest Update, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recommended Mods:
If you want your face to be smooth like on my screenshot use this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?]Pretty Face by [b]tktk[/b][/url]
If you want a real man's body texture with huge biceps use this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by [b]Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/b][/url]
If you want a bigger hero like body structure use this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE by [b]Groovtama[/b][/url]
If you want the second sword dont disappear into thin air when sheathed use this  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux by [b]Neovalen[/b][/url]
If you want to give the followers a house use this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My Home Is Your Home - a mod for followers by [b]Volek[/b][/url]
                                                            or this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62040/?]My Home is Your Home (MHiYH 2plus) by [b]Volek and upgraded MCM options by Smashly[/b][/url]
If you want to organize your followers use this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by [b]Original - fLokii -- Recent updates - Vamyan[/b][/url]
                                                        or this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by [b]Dheuster[/b][/url]
                                                        or this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework by [b]Expired[/b][/url]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: Use NMM or manually install by drag and drop to Data Folder
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall: Use NMM or manually delete files and esp (Completely safe to uninstall anytime)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility: Compatible with all Mods because I only use Vanilla Assets
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans: Add More Vanilla Followers
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other Skyrim Special Edition mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/27633780/?tb=mods&pUp=1]dlarkz skyrim special edition mods[/url]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other Skyrim mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27633780/?tb=mods&pUp=1]dlarkz skyrim mods[/url]
author: dlarkz
